CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 29, 1945, pg. 12, reads: "Christmas Gift! - Edward Brown Sr., of Neville Street, gave his children, Charles (center) Fannie and Edward Brown Jr., the best Christmas gift of all when he presented them the $1,000 in Victory Bonds. Mr. Brown, who is both father and mother to his little family, has tucked the bonds away for their college education. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Edward Brown Sr. presenting Victory savings bonds to his children Fannie Brown, Edward Brown Jr., and Charles Brown in front, in Harris Studio
